hymn.title: I am the Lord's! O joy beyond expression

layout.singingstanza: I am the Lord's! O joy be -- yond ex -- pres -- sion, O sweet res -- ponse to voice of love Di -- vine; Faith's joy -- ous "Yes" to the as -- sur -- ing whis -- per, "Fear not! I have re -- deemed thee; thou art Mine."

lyrics.stanza: I am the Lord's! O joy beyond expression, O sweet response to voice of love Divine; Faith's joyous "Yes" to the assuring whisper, "Fear not! I have redeemed thee; thou art Mine."
I am the Lord's! It is the glad confession Wherewith the Bride recalls the happy day, When love's "I will" accepted Him forever, "The Lord's," to love, to honor and obey.
I am the Lord's! Yet teach me all it meaneth, All it involves of love and loyalty, Of holy service, absolute surrender, And unreserved obedience unto Thee.
I am the Lord's! Yes; body, soul, and spirit, O seal them irrecoverably Thine; As Thou, Beloved, in Thy grace and fulness Forever and forevermore art mine.
